attributes.action: Give more  information to families regarding sex offenders in the area
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We feel that parents have the right to know if known sex offenders are living in the local area for the protection of the children for all in that area.As this affects the parents choice regarding living/moving to that area.Surely a breach of the parents human rights to know if they are without their knowledge putting their children in danger by remaining or moving to that area.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
